timeline.bodyText:
I think we need to return exactly an InterceptableChannel from here.
And let's call it like currentInterceptableChannel()! A "make" is confusing a little bit...
timeline.author: artembilan

timeline.bodyText: Method JavaDocs must be imperative style: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Code-Style#javadoc-formatting
timeline.author: artembilan

timeline.bodyText:
Well, our style to make methods on this builder as verbs, in other words commands: do this or that.
Look at this as EIP-operators!
Therefore if we add this feature here, it has to be named as intercept().

timeline.message:
GH-3204: Add channel interceptor support to flow definition

Adds an `intercept()` builder method to register one or more
channel interceptors at the current flow position.

Fixes https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-integration/issues/3204

* add `intercept(ChannelInterceptor...)` to `BaseIntegrationFlowDefinition`
* refactor to reuse interceptable channel creation from `wireTap`
* document the new operator
